system.description:
You were born with considerable innate magical talent and a brilliant, analytical mind, so it comes as no surprise that you have turned your prodigious mental capacity to the study of where your powers came from.

When you take this feat, choose a creature type other than humanoid, beast, construct, or plant that your sorcerer powers are derived from. This is your ancestry type.

You gain the following benefits:

  • Your Intelligence or Charisma score increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.
  • You gain proficiency with the History skill if you do not already have it and an expertise die if you do. You also gain the genealogy skill specialty for the History skill or another History skill specialty if you already have it.
  • You learn the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.my7wwb844zvxcv4o]{Comprehend Languages} and @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.vyneq4c6bdvado50]{Searing Equation} spells as sorcerer spells, which do not count against your spells known.
  • You gain the Sage background’s @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-background-features.Item.92xafazfk58herh6]{Library Privileges} feature. If you already have it, the DC of the check you can research an answer for rises to 25. 
  • When researching lore about your ancestry type, the DC you can research is increased by 5.
  • You gain the following special manifestation in addition to any other you have: Overwhelming Insight
system.prerequisite: 3 Levels in Scholar, 3 Levels in Sorcerer
